oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DIVERSITY ORIENTED APPROACH TO PHENYLALANINE DERIVATIVES VIA THE DIELS-ALDER REACTION INVOLVING SULFOLENE INTERMEDIATES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
BANDI, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: AMINO-ACID DERIVATIVES
CROSS-ENYNE METATHESIS
STEREOSELECTIVE-SYNTHESIS
KEY STEP
REGIOSELECTIVE ALKYLATION
(E,E)-CONJUGATED DIENES
3-SULFOLENES
S,S-DIOXIDE
CHEMISTRY
SYNTHON
alpha-Amino Acid
Dials-Alder Reaction
Sulfolene Diethyl Acetamidomalonate
Unusual Amino Acid
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report a new synthetic approach to highly functionalized phenylalanine derivatives via sulfolenes as latent diene equivalents. Here, the Diels-Alder reaction has been used as a key step to assemble diverse unusual amino acid derivatives.
